sys_script_include.name: QHSrevisionFromCatalog

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_4a7b0022879b7c5005ec65750cbb35e3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_epats_qhs.QHSrevisionFromCatalog</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>QHSrevisionFromCatalog</name><script><![CDATA[var QHSrevisionFromCatalog = Class.create();
QHSrevisionFromCatalog.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    updateRecord: function () {

              var recordid = this.getParameter('sysparm_recordid');
		      var userid = this.getParameter('sysparm_userid');

              var gr = new GlideRecord('x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy');
		
			gr.addQuery('sys_id',recordid);
			gr.query();
		
			var recordURL;
			var baseURL = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
		
			if (gr.next()){
				
				var gr_check = new GlideRecord('x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy');
				gr_check.addQuery('kb_article',gr.kb_article);
				gr_check.addQuery('state','draft').addOrCondition('state','commentary').addOrCondition('state','review').addOrCondition('state','awaiting approval').addOrCondition('state','approval');
				gr_check.query();
				
				if (gr_check.next()){
					return 'in_revision';
				}

				var gr2 = new GlideRecord('x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy');

				gr2.initialize();
				gr2.name = gr.name;
				gr2.u_string_1 = gr.u_string_1;
				gr2.assigned_to = userid;
				gr2.opened_by = userid;
				gr2.procedure_2 = 'update';
				gr2.kb_article = gr.kb_article;
				gr2.insert();

				recordURL = gr2.getLink();

				GlideSysAttachment.copy('kb_knowledge',current.kb_article,'x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy',gr2.sys_id);
				
			}
			
			gs.info('QHS TEST baseURL: ' + baseURL);
			gs.info('QHS TEST recordURL: ' + recordURL);
		
			gs.addInfoMessage(baseURL);
		
			var urlFinal = baseURL + recordURL; //Replace with your form field

			gs.setRedirect(urlFinal);

              return urlFinal;            

      }
	
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-22 08:20:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a7b0022879b7c5005ec65750cbb35e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>QHSrevisionFromCatalog</sys_name><sys_package display_value="QHS" source="x_epats_qhs">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="QHS">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4a7b0022879b7c5005ec65750cbb35e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-07 09:42:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
